name: places/ChIJS_SNoeFYwokRzbR4yC8U-ZI
formattedAddress: 429 E 52nd St #1, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 429 E 52nd St #1, New York, NY 10022-6430, USA

originalText.text: Dr Burke’s exams are always very thorough. She found a small spot on my knee that I hadn’t even noticed, and it ended up being a non-invasive skin cancer, easily treated. She is friendly and personable, and happy to discuss the science behind her Longévité products and her approach to skin care if you are interested in doing so. (There is zero pressure to purchase her products, and I started out slowly and somewhat skeptically. Nevertheless, my experience has been that they are reasonably priced and work really well). Dr Burke maintains a youthful energy and excitement about her work that is palpable: you leave her office really wanting to take good care of your skin. The office is comfortable; the staff pleasant. In addition to her private medical practice, Dr Burke is a busy hospital physician most mornings, so bear that in mind as you schedule your appointment. I thoroughly recommend her.

originalText.text: Dr. Burke is an amazing physician, she was able to accommodate me last minute to address a medical concern of mine. She's a great listener and she's has excellent bedside manners. She answered both my wife's questions and mine and she made sure we had all the information we needed. She gave us plenty of time to discuss and we didn't feel rushed at all during the appointment. I am happy to have chosen her as my physician.

text.text: Dr. Burke is an amazing physician, she was able to accommodate me last minute to address a medical concern of mine. She's a great listener and she's has excellent bedside manners. She answered both my wife's questions and mine and she made sure we had all the information we needed. She gave us plenty of time to discuss and we didn't feel rushed at all during the appointment. I am happy to have chosen her as my physician.

originalText.text: Dr. Burke is always friendly and helpful. I suffer from a terrible skin condition that flares up occasionally. Dr. Burke has offered a variety of options and has been very understanding. Fortunately, she has her own line of tar shampoo that helped my dry, flaky scalp. Her staff is friendly and helpful in resolving billing questions. I feel very comfortable with Dr. Burke and have been seeing her for ten years now. I truly recommend her as a dermatologist.

Fortunately, she has her own line of tar shampoo that helped my dry, flaky scalp. Her staff is friendly and helpful in resolving billing questions. I feel very comfortable with Dr. Burke and have been seeing her for ten years now. I truly recommend her as a dermatologist.

originalText.text: I have not seen Dr. Burke for a few years, however, I found her to be the best dermatologist in Manhattan. She is extremely knowledgeable of not only conventional therapies, but complementary and alternative therapies as well. She is friendly and very compassionate with the concerns of her patients. I wish more physicians were like Dr. Burke.

originalText.text:
Chronically late.  This woman will make you wait over an hour every single appointment, even if you take her first available appointment of the morning.  Dr Burke, your time is not more important than mine.  I also saw her be verbally abusive to her staff on two separate occasions.  Avoid this doctor and find someone else.

**Update. I'd like to respond to Dr Burke's answer to my review:   You are chronically late. I made the first appointment of the day on two occasions because I was tired of having to wait for you.  On the day of the first appointment,  you were 15 minutes late arriving to the office and on the other occasion, you were nearly an hour late.  People who are constantly late are selfish.  Your time is not more important than mine.  Stop lying and STOP speaking to your staff in the abusive manner in which I have personally witnessed.
